metaDescription: BREATHE 3 Torrevieja: Modern 2-bedroom apartments from €259,000. By PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. Delivery April 2026. Near beaches, golf, hospitals.

content.heroIntro:
Welcome to BREATHE 3, an exceptional new residential development in Torre Pacheco, Torrevieja, brought to you by the trusted developer PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. This stunning collection of modern 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartments offers the perfect blend of contemporary design, quality construction, and strategic location in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal destinations. With prices starting from just €259,000 and delivery scheduled for April 1st, 2026, BREATHE 3 represents an outstanding opportunity for homebuyers and investors seeking premium Spanish property at exceptional value.

Torrevieja has emerged as the largest expat community in Spain, where English is widely spoken and international lifestyle thrives. BREATHE 3 captures the essence of Mediterranean living with its 82m² thoughtfully designed spaces, featuring private amenities and access to a resort-style communal environment. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, a vacation retreat, or an investment property with strong rental potential, BREATHE 3 delivers on all fronts. The development's location offers seamless access to pristine beaches like the Blue Flag-rated Playa del Cura, world-class golf courses, international schools, and comprehensive healthcare facilities.

This is more than just property purchase—it's an investment in a lifestyle. BREATHE 3 combines the tranquility of a residential community with the convenience of being minutes away from Torrevieja's vibrant amenities, excellent infrastructure, and welcoming international community.

locationSection.intro: Torre Pacheco, nestled within the heart of Torrevieja, Alicante, is a thriving residential area that has become synonymous with quality living and international appeal. This charming locale perfectly balances the serenity of residential living with immediate access to world-class facilities and stunning natural landscapes. Torrevieja itself is renowned as Spain's largest expat community, where English is spoken everywhere and international residents enjoy a seamless lifestyle transition. The area boasts excellent year-round weather, with over 300 days of sunshine annually, making it ideal for those seeking a Mediterranean climate. Torre Pacheco's strategic position provides easy access to everything from family-friendly beaches and championship golf courses to hospitals, international schools, and shopping centers. The growing infrastructure and continuous development underscore Torrevieja's status as one of Spain's most attractive property markets, with values appreciating at 8% year-on-year.
highlights: Airport: 30 minutes to Alicante-Elche International Airport (ALC)
Beach: 8 minutes to Playa del Cura (Blue Flag), 6km to La Mata golden sands
Golf: 15 minutes to Villamartín Golf Club, 15 minutes to Las Ramblas, 20 minutes to Campoamor
Hospital: 5 minutes to Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (public, 24hr emergency)
Shopping: Mercadona, Carrefour, Lidl, Aldi, and Iceland supermarkets nearby
Schools: El Limonar International School (British), Colegio Internacional de Torrevieja
Restaurants: Diverse dining from tapas bars to international cuisine throughout Torre Pacheco
Transport: Regular bus connections to Alicante, Murcia, and coastal towns

propertyFeatures.intro: BREATHE 3 apartments are meticulously designed and constructed to the highest Spanish building standards, ensuring durability, comfort, and contemporary style. Each unit features carefully selected materials and premium finishes throughout, with attention paid to energy efficiency and modern living requirements. The development adheres to current building regulations and includes professional project management by PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, guaranteeing quality at every stage. The 82m² homes maximize space efficiency while maintaining an open, airy feel perfect for both permanent residents and holiday visitors.
features: Communal swimming pool with landscaped gardens
Fitted kitchen with quality appliances included
Double glazing with thermal break technology

content.investmentSection: BREATHE 3 represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's strongest property markets. Torrevieja property values have demonstrated consistent growth at 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing national averages. The development is positioned 45% below comparable property prices on Costa Blanca's northern coast, offering remarkable value without compromising on quality or location. Rental potential is substantial—holiday rentals achieve approximately €650 per week, making BREATHE 3 an excellent option for income-generating investment. The largest expat community in Spain ensures sustained demand for both long-term rentals and holiday lettings. With delivery scheduled for April 2026, early buyers can secure properties at launch prices while the market continues its upward trajectory. The combination of strong appreciation potential, robust rental yields, and growing international interest in Torrevieja makes BREATHE 3 an astute financial decision.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in BREATHE 3?
faqs.answer: Properties in BREATHE 3 start from €259,000 for 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartments of 82m². This represents exceptional value, being 45% less than comparable properties on Costa Blanca's northern coast. Contact PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE directly for current availability and specific pricing.

faqs.question: When will BREATHE 3 be completed?
faqs.answer: BREATHE 3 is scheduled for delivery on April 1st, 2026. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. For specific unit delivery schedules and payment plans, contact the developer directly.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of BREATHE 3?
faqs.answer: PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE is the developer behind BREATHE 3. They have an established track record in Torrevieja and surrounding areas, delivering quality residential projects with professional management and attention to detail.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Torrevieja hosts Spain's largest expat community with English widely spoken everywhere. Property values appreciate at 8% year-on-year. The area offers excellent amenities including Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (24hr public hospital), Blue Flag Playa del Cura, world-class golf, international schools, and year-round Mediterranean weather.

faqs.question: How far is BREATHE 3 from the beach?
faqs.answer: BREATHE 3 is just 8 minutes from Playa del Cura, which holds Blue Flag status for water quality and safety. La Mata with its 6km golden sand beach is 6 minutes away. Multiple other beaches including Los Locos and Los Náufragos are within 10 minutes.

faqs.question: What amenities are near BREATHE 3?
faqs.answer: Near BREATHE 3 you'll find: Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (5 min, public 24hr), Quirónsalud Torrevieja (private), Mercadona/Carrefour/Lidl supermarkets, Villamartín Golf Club (15 min), Las Ramblas Golf (15 min), El Limonar International School, and dozens of restaurants and bars throughout Torre Pacheco.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my BREATHE 3 apartment?
faqs.answer: Yes, BREATHE 3 apartments are ideal for holiday rental investment. Torrevieja's thriving tourism market supports rental rates of approximately €650 per week. The large expat community and international appeal ensure consistent demand for both holiday and long-term rentals.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja safe for expats and families?
faqs.answer: Torrevieja is widely recognized as a safe destination for expats and families. As Spain's largest expat community, it offers excellent infrastructure, international schools like El Limonar, comprehensive healthcare, and an established support system for newcomers. Crime rates in residential areas are low.

content.conclusion: BREATHE 3 represents a remarkable opportunity to invest in premium Spanish property at exceptional value. With prices starting from €259,000, delivery in April 2026, and location in Torrevieja's thriving Torre Pacheco area, this development delivers exceptional returns for owner-occupiers and investors alike. The combination of quality construction by PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, immediate beach access, championship golf nearby, and vibrant expat community make BREATHE 3 the perfect choice. Whether seeking a Mediterranean home, holiday retreat, or rental investment, BREATHE 3 exceeds expectations. Don't miss this opportunity—contact us today via WhatsApp or phone to reserve your property, discuss payment options, or arrange a site visit. Our expert team is ready to guide you through every step of your property journey.
